@pytest.mark.positive
    @allure.title("Open the idrive link and verify the Upgrade button")
    @allure.description("Verify that the Upgrade button is displayed")
    def test_MiniProject3_VWO():
        driver = webdriver.Chrome()
    
        try:
            driver.maximize_window()
            driver.get("https://www.idrive360.com/enterprise/login")
    
            # Perform login actions
            user_name = driver.find_element(By.ID, 'username')
            user_name.send_keys('augtest_040823@idrive.com')
            password = driver.find_element(By.ID, 'password')
            password.send_keys("123456")
            sign_in = driver.find_element(By.XPATH, '//button[text()="Sign in"]')
            sign_in.click()
    
            # Wait until the URL changes to contain the expected path
            WebDriverWait(driver, 15).until(EC.url_contains("https://www.idrive360.com/enterprise/account"))
    
            # Print the current URL to check if it's correct
            current_url = driver.current_url
            print("Current URL:", current_url)
    
            # Assert that the URL contains the expected substring
            expected_url = "https://www.idrive360.com/enterprise/account"
            assert expected_url in current_url, f"Unexpected URL: {current_url}"
    
            # Wait for the text element to be present and check its content
            text_element = WebDriverWait(driver, 10).until(
                EC.presence_of_element_located((By.XPATH, '//h5[@class="id-card-title"]'))
            )
    
            actual_text = text_element.text
            print("Text found:", actual_text)
    
            # Assert the text content
            expected_text = 'Your free trial has expired'
